name: BlockX
description: Block X - Open Network for Finance. Global multi- chain Payment & Settlement Chain for Digital Assets , transforming traditional Finance into the Blockchain era. We are building a new public Layer 1 delegated proof of stake (DPOS) chain for cross chain settlement and payments. BCX is the native token of BlockX. BCX is used for gas fees , oracle fees, staking, validating and using various dapps on BlockX.
